Peter Morici, economist and business professor at the University of Maryland, will discuss his recent op-ed on “Trump’s Foreign Policy Reset.”

Robert Spencer, director of Jihad Watch and New York Times bestselling author of The Politically Incorrect Guide to Islam (and the Crusades), will discuss his Breitbart London op-ed about the recent comments UK Prime Minister Theresa May made about him.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart London Editor-in-Chief Raheem Kassam will continue our analysis of the election of President-elect Donald Trump, the progress of his transition team, and his policy vision, as the Trump cabinet takes shape in the run up to Christmas.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss his thoughts on the choice of former ExxonMobil CEO Rex Tillerson for Secretary of State.
Breitbart London’s James Delingpole will weigh in on the choice of former Texas governor Rick Perry as Energy Secretary.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Filmmaker Ami Horowitz will discuss his assault while filming a documentary in an Islamic “No Go” zone in Sweden.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
